text: All the functions, duties, property, records, and personnel associated with the control and elimination of rodents now under the authority of the Department of Public Works are transferred to the Bureau.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90-day) addition of section, see notes following § 8-2101.01.

For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see §§ 902 to 908 of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-438, October 20, 2000, 47 DCR 8740).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-172, see notes following § 8-2101.01.

DC CODE § 8-2101.02

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Transfer of functions and duties from the Department of Public Works.
